title: The Mahomes Comeback Game, the Titans Out-Bully the Ravens, and More Playoff Chaos | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Seahawks participated in yet another abnormal football game in their loss to the Packers, which featured a clutch Aaron Rodgers performance. Then we break down the Chiefs' historic 24-point comeback against the Texans (2:00). Next, we appreciate the incredible Titans' win over the Ravens and the 49ers taking care of business against the Vikings (22:50).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
